item.title: About
item.description:
I am a backend software engineer with over a decade of experience working with Nodejs, TS, AWS and Kubernetes

I live in EST with my partner and I have a daughter. I grew up in Delhi, India and spent half a decade working to build software in Bangalore where I have gained my initial experience as a Software Engineer.

I moved to Ontario and worked as a Platform Engineer where I have grown interest in learning K8s specifically where it can power a developer to so much.

All views here are my own and do not represent those of my employer, past or present.

Contact

You can email me. Get in touch if you have an opinion on my posts. I enjoy hearing from people with similar interests.
